alert.note: Alert for Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 2:01PM EST until January 07 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...In Ohio, Washington, Jackson OH and Meigs Counties. In West Virginia, Tyler County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills tonight into Friday morning are likely to drop into the single digits above zero.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Additional information can be found at https://www.weather.gov/rlx as well as on our Facebook and Twitter pages.
